item.title: Ethical fashion
item.description: To be honestly, this note was one of the main reasons I wanted to make a website: so I could easily link friends and family to resources about ethical fashion, without me necessarily dumping an entire essay into their DMs. What is ethical fashion? What is fast fashion?
item.content:encoded:
To be honestly, this note was one of the main reasons I wanted to make a website: so I could easily link friends and family to resources about ethical fashion, without me necessarily dumping an entire essay into their DMs.

What is ethical fashion?

What is fast fashion?
